thread.title: First meeting set for Vermont solar siting panel
thread.title_full: First meeting set for Vermont solar siting panel - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: wcax.com
title: First meeting set for Vermont solar siting panel
text:
MONTPELIER, Vt. (AP) - A 10-member Vermont panel is going to be meeting for the first time to work out issues related to the siting of solar power projects.
On Tuesday, the Solar Siting Task Force will begin the process of looking at the design, siting, and regulatory review of solar electric generation facilities.
The panel was created as part of a comprehensive energy bill passed this year. It's designed to address concerns raised by some municipalities and others about the fast growth of solar power projects around Vermont.
The panel will report back to the General Assembly with proposed legislation and provide the rationale for any proposals it makes.
The Tuesday session is slated to be held from 1 p.m. to 3 p.m. at the Department of Public Service in Montpelier.
